verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Anywhere with Jesus
I can safely go
Anywhere He leads me
In this world below
Anywhere without Him
Dearest joys would fade
Anywhere with Jesus
I am not afraid

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Anywhere - Anywhere
Fear I cannot know
Anywhere with Jesus
I can safely go

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Anywhere with Jesus
I am not alone
Other friends may fail me
He is still my own
Though His hand may lead me
Over dreary ways
Anwhere with Jesus
Is a house of praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Anywhere with Jesus
I can go to sleep
When the darkling shadows
Round about me creep
Knowing I shall waken
Never more to roam
Anywhere with Jesus
Will be home sweet home
